# Summary
 Clear the specified Looping Effect on the Target Entity by Effect Instance ID. After a successful mount, the \[Mount Looping Effect\] node generates an Effect Instance ID

# Input Parameters
* [input:Special_Effect_Instance_ID] (Integer) - Instance ID automatically generated by the Mount Looping Special Effect node
* [input:Target_Entity] (Entity) - Active Entity
